Plot: Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999) before its release.
Title: Fanboys
Writer: Ernest Cline (screenplay), Adam F. Goldberg (screenplay), Ernest Cline (story), Dan Pulick (story)
Actors: Sam Huntington, Chris Marquette, Dan Fogler, Jay Baruchel
tomatoConsensus: This undercooked, sporadically funny road movie is a sop to Star Wars fanatics, but the uninitiated will find little to enjoy.
